title: Consumer spending in Pakistan 2013 - 2018 , per capita
summary: The statistic shows the U.S. of Pakistan 2018 from 2013 to 2018 .
In 2018 , the U.S. of dollars in the dollars in the Pakistan amounted to 1658 U.S. , an increase of more than five percent compared to the previous Year .
gold: This statistic depicts consumer spending in Pakistan from 2013 to 2018 , per capita . In 2013 , Pakistan 's consumer spending per capita was 995 U.S. dollars .
